description:
T036 Horse chestnut - Prune branches to 3m for pedestrian access  
T038 Horse chestnut - Prune branches to 3m for pedestrian access      
T048 Lime - Prune branches to 3m for pedestrian access   
T049 Cedar - Height reduction by 3mt, reduce lateral towards neighbouring building by 1.0mt - tree height at 19mt to be reduced to 16mt - tree width towards neighbouring building 2.5mt to be reduced to 1.0mt - excessive leaf fall now creating unmanageable service costs, gutter gaiters already fitted.  
T050 Cedar - Height reduction by 3mt, reduce lateral towards neighbouring building by 1mt, tree height at 18mt to be reduced to 15mt - tree width towards neighbouring building 2.5mt to be reduced to 1.0mt - excessive leaf fall now creating unmanageable service costs, gutter gaiters already fitted. 
T051 Lime - Height reduction by 3m due to weak union with cavity - tree height at  9mt to be reduced to 6mt - tree width at 3mt.
T052 Lime - Crown lift  to 3m for pedestrian access   
T053 Lime - Crown lift to 3m for pedestrian access  
T054 Lime - Crown lift to 3m for pedestrian access  
T055 Lime - Crown lift to 3m for pedestrian access   
T057 Lime - Crown lift to 3m for pedestrian access
